questions.question: How does the butler Klahadore adjust his glasses?
questions.answer: By using his palm to push them up

questions.question: How did Luffy know Usopp's dad back at Syrup Village?
questions.answer: Yassop is a member of the Red Hair Pirates

questions.question: Why was Kuro undercover as a butler for three years?
questions.answer: To steal Kaya’s wealth without arousing any suspicion

questions.question: For what occasion did Kaya buy a present for Klahadore?
questions.answer: His 3-year anniversary of working for her

questions.question: Who was the first ally to engage the Kuro Pirates after they changed locations?
How did Zoro get out of the oil slick in Syrup Village?
questions.answer: He used his swords to climb out

questions.question: How did the Kuro Pirates suddenly get stronger during the fight?
Name one of the Nyaban Brothers.
What do the Symbols on Kuro’s coat represent?
Why does Kuro adjust his glasses the way he does?
questions.answer: A habit he picked up from having swords for hands
